replies.body: He does, and you need to learn to use CC and kite.

> He does, and you need to learn to use CC and kite.

Yes, let's kite a jump + stun on a 5s cooldown. The only way to beat Jax is to play cancer like Quinn and Lissandra top.

It really isn't. I've played a lot of Jax {{champion:24}} (PAX Jax owner :P ) and I've faced a lot of Jax. He is terribly easy to kite, even if the Jax player knows how to ward jump.

While yes Jax can typically out trade any ranged ADC, there are a bunch that can easily kite him, such as Draven{{champion:119}} , Kalista{{champion:429}}  and Vayne{{champion:67}} . These three typically have no trouble at all with dealing with Jax.
I've also experienced Sivir {{champion:15}} being able to destroy Jax easily, but then again I play a lot of Sivir, one of my most favourite champs ever, have been playing her since S1.
Correcting isn't feeding, feeding a troll is to reply in a ragey and butt hurt form.
